ðŸ“– Summary: The telegram-files repository provides a self-hosted solution for automatically downloading files from Telegram channels and groups. It supports multiple accounts, allows pausing and resuming downloads, and can automatically transfer files to other locations. The application also offers a responsive design with preview capabilities for downloaded media.
